nodes.text: Dalia was a small village on the planet Dalicron-4.

Dalia was the only settlement on Dalicron-4 and had the planet's only landing facility, a large field that could house up to eight light freighters. It was small, with a population of about 100 people. The village had various facilities, including a tavern, a lumber mill, a general store and a welcome center. The Ithorian doctor Aloor had an office there, while the Rodian Meebo operated a hunting business from a building in the northwest side of the township.

Dalia was founded about 800 years before the Galactic Civil War, by a group of colonists from the Inner Rim. They wanted to escape their hectic lives within the Galactic Republic and named the settlement after Dalia, their leader.
In 3 ABY, a group of Alliance to Restore the Republic agents traveled to Dalia to find Caeleb, the "Child of Light."
